title: Pansy at the Palace
description: Pansy's life blossoms when she is adopted from an animal shelter by a loving family and little girl named Avery. Swept into her new life at the Palace Hotel in Beverly Hills, this smart and courageous puppy saves the day by solving a mysterious theft. Pansy at the Palace celebrates the spirit of curiousity and exploration, and teaches us that no one is too small to make a difference in the lives of many! First in the classic series of children's books. Recommended for ages 3-7, pre level 1, emergent readers, early readers, beginning readers.
author: Cynthia Bardes
